By using Normal, Fairy, and Ice Gems the White Flute increases the player's Shiny Chance. == Details == White Flute increases the player's Shiny Chance by a base 2%. The Base effect is multiplied by the players Achievement Bonus, to a current maximum of 18%, with an achievement bonus of 800%.
